Get Involved

As we continue to grow, the NeuroXR Collaborative is consistently seeking new relationships with students, faculty, and community members. There are multiple ways to get involved with the NeuroXR team. Students interested in joining the team can learn more about roles and inquire about current opportunities. We also seek new collaborations for individuals at IUPUI, IUSM, and beyond who seek to employ VR or AR in their work.

Contact Us

Students

NeuroXR Collaborative would not be successful without the contributions of our student workers. Undergraduate and graduate students have played a vital role in both the research and developmental processes, from conceptualization to the final product. This work provides hands-on experience with state-of-the-art technology and software that is used in leading tech companies, medical centers, and entertainment studios. Availability of paid and unpaid positions varies. Dependent on the timing of projects, our student teams scale to the roles listed below. Should you have a background or area of study in these areas, let us know your interests! Contact Us to inquire about current opportunities.

Collaborators

NeuroXR Collaborative wants to work with you! As VR and AR technologies become more prominent for research, clinical, educational, and commercial purposes, we aim to partner with forward-thinking individuals who want to incorporate new XR technology into their work. We welcome those at any stage of the process, even if questions or ideas are all you have. Connect with us, and we can discuss our capabilities and how we can work together.
